channel.title: Embedded on Foundries.io
channel.description: Recent content in Embedded on Foundries.io

item.title: Foundries.io at Embedded World 2018
item.description: Foundries.io is excited to have an opportunity to demonstrate our end to end IoT microPlatforms at this years Embedded World conference in Nuremburg, Germany. The Embedded World conference takes place between February 27th-March 1st at the Embedded World conference Center. OSF will be presenting in the Zephyr booth, located in Hall 4, booth number: 4-680.
